revdescription.para: Initial version on how to use BEA with JAG.

section.title: Introduction
section.para: Initial support has been implemented for BEA.

section.title: WebLogic 8.1
section.para: This is the xdoclet version partly supported by JAG. Alle features of JAG can be used excluding Container Managed Relations.

section.title: WebLogic 8.1 EJBGen support
section.para: WebLogic Workshop has default support for EJBGen, which is similar to xdoclet. With JAG it is now possible to generate a EJB module for WebLogic Workshop in EJBGen format. The generated source Can NOT be built with the ANT script. WebLogic Workshop is needed for that.
